title: laptop specs
content:
Will i7 13th gen, 16g ram and 512gb ssd with nvidia gtx 3050 suffice for 4 yrs (cse core)?
also how many hrs of battery life should i look for?

comments.body: Agar sirf coding karni hai to dedicated GPU mat le ya mux switch wala integrated graphics wala laptop le . Gaming laptops ki battery bahut kharb rehti hai 2 saal baad to Bina charger ke chalega bhi nhi and 3 4 year mein sabse zyada zaroorat hogi
gaming toh i wont do often, sirf week me ek do bar, par i want to be able to run games
Hows your experience with the hp victus?
